welcome_message_body: Welcome to Elizabeth, where historic charm meets modern flair! Known for its rich history, diverse culture, and vibrant atmosphere, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: Valenca Restaurant
restaurants.description: Valenca Restaurant is a portuguese restaurant located in Elizabeth.
restaurants.address: 665 Monroe Ave (at Louisa St), Elizabeth, NJ 07201

restaurants.name: El Lechon De Negron
restaurants.description: El Lechon De Negron is a food truck located in Union.
restaurants.address: 1331 Magie Ave (Galloping Hill Rd), Union, NJ 07083

restaurants.name: Pinho's Bakery
restaurants.description: Pinho's Bakery is a bakery located in Roselle.
restaurants.address: 1027 Chestnut St (East Eleventh Avenue), Roselle, NJ 07203

restaurants.name: Pizza Masters
restaurants.description: Pizza Masters is a pizzeria located in Bayonne.

restaurants.name: Wawa
restaurants.description: Wawa is a breakfast spot located in Roselle.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving mostly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The newest and most modern terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving mostly United Airlines flights.

wifi.note: Limited to 30 minutes per session, but can be reconnected multiple times.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linden Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport serves all domestic flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The newest terminal at LaGuardia Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The largest terminal at LaGuardia Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A newly renovated terminal at LaGuardia Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: A small terminal at LaGuardia Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may be limited in certain areas.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal mainly serves international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal mainly serves domestic flights for Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal is one of the largest and busiest at JFK, serving international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal mainly serves domestic flights for JetBlue.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for British Airways, Iberia, and other select airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
